thread.title: Great friendly hotel, poor restaurant
thread.title_full: Great friendly hotel, poor restaurant - Review of Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Simon-sedgewell
title: Great friendly hotel, poor restaurant
text:
No complaints about hotel, much better than expected. Restaurant very nice but food awful, i had fish and chips, not sure what fish it was, it was defiantly frozen and could not eat it. Steak for the wife was ok but not great quality. Ice cream for desert was awful, and flakes were some poor quality alternative, for Â£75 for 2 adults and 2 children i expect better. I would venture out of hotel for a decent meal.
Room Tip: No view from room! See more room tips
